name: Bat's Curfew
description:
You've been outside for too long,  get back to your coffin  before sunrise!

Controls

Pause - "SPACE" or "ESC"
Restart - "R"
Mute - "M" (or click on the icon)
Movement - "WASD" or arrow keys

Assets Used:

Visual Assets

AntumDeluge - Player Sprites

Cainos - Tilemap

Audio

Death Sound

Game Over Sound

Win Sound

background music

Fonts

Melted Monster

Market Deco

This is my first game jam entry as well as my first game made using godot! This project was a really nice way to build familiarity with the engine, hope you enjoy!
